Text.Page:
I want you to put a stop to the slaughter on Mistmoor Island.

Hunt down the {@LinkCreature:12#15#Red Lash cleavers} and {@LinkCreature:12#21#gula slavemasters}. Teach the syndicate a lesson!

Report your success to Taniel at Vindicator Outpost.
Keep up the good work, <PCCLASS:lcase>. For the federation!
You have not eliminated enough foes to complete this mission.
